Auto Generated Code Documentation¶

deploy.create_or_update_environment(ssh)[source]¶

create the environment with the environment.yml file, update the environment if the environment already exists

deploy.git_clone(ssh)[source]¶

clone the repository from github repo to the server

deploy.main()[source]¶

call all the functions, make the connection, repo clone, environment setup and run the server

deploy.run_server(ssh)[source]¶

run the web server, connect the frontend and the backend

deploy.ssh_client()[source]¶

Return ssh client object

deploy.ssh_connection(ssh, ec2_address, user, key_file)[source]¶

Login via SSH to the server
